p: GC/MS showed marked variation in the major ingredients of oils prepared in spring, summer, autumn, and winter, respectively. The composition of the essential oils differed quantitatively and qualitatively according to the time of collection. A detailed comparative analysis of all the oils with different seasons has been recorded in Table 1, with phenyl propanoids in Table 2 and Figure 1, while the class composition is in Table 3 and Table 4.
